short_description_localized.en:
Revel in the spectacular views of this historic building and visit it in person—it’s just a few steps from our front door. This is one NYC attraction offer you can't miss! Our Empire State Package includes:

Discounted room rates
Prime view from our Empire State rooms
Two admission tickets to Empire State Building's Sustainability exhibit, Dare to Dream exhibit, and the 86th-floor observation deck
